channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260108.1)
item.description:
What's New

refactor: Remove fixAutocomplete setting and improve address bar detection

  • Remove fixAutocomplete setting from UI and preferences
  • Forward Delete now only applies to apps detected as requiring autocomplete method
  • Improve address bar detection in AppBehaviorDetector:

* Add explicit checks for Safari address bar (AXTextField role)

* Add checks for Arc browser address bar

* Refine Firefox address bar detection logic

  • Remove shouldSendForwardDelete() method from CharacterInjector
  • Keep shouldSendForwardDeleteForAutocomplete() for detected autocomplete apps
  • Update debug view to increase max display lines to 5000
  • Bump version to 20260108.1

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
